snippet: The sale of the drug will be legal in Colorado and Washington next month, and some observers predict other states will soon follow suit.
abstract: Colorado and Washington State are first states to allow sale of marijuana without doctors' notes or medical reasons to purchase drug; many predict other states will soon follow suit, if pioneering states will be able to regulate and contain drug that is still outlawed across most of nation.

byline.original: By JACK HEALY and KIRK JOHNSON

lead_paragraph: The sale of the drug will be legal in Colorado and Washington next month, and some observers predict other states will soon follow suit.

headline.main: In 2 States, Corner Cannabis Store Nears Reality
headline.print_headline: In 2 States, Corner Cannabis Store Nears Reality
